name: Talk_BoneBoy
_source: speak;BoneBoy;Those poor villagers...|They didn't deserve this.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Don't get all sentimental on me, Princess.|I just don't like seeing innocent people suffer.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;There's nothing wrong with caring about others.
speak;BoneBoy;Maybe not.|But I can't help wondering...|did I have people I cared about before?|A family?|Friends?;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;I'm sure you did.|And perhaps they're still out there, waiting for you.
speak;BoneBoy;Ha, wouldn't that be something.|A skeleton with a family reunion to attend.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Medical supplies, huh?|Good thing someone around here has a functioning brain.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;That was very thoughtful of you to search for them, {v:SkeletonName}.|
speak;BoneBoy;Well, being made of bones gives me a unique perspective on medical needs.|Trust me on that one.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Your knowledge of healing is impressive.|Were you perhaps a healer in your past life?
speak;BoneBoy;Who knows?|Maybe I was a doctor, maybe I was just accident-prone.|Hard to tell when your memories are as scattered as my bones used to be.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Either way, you're helping save lives now.|That's what matters.
speak;BoneBoy;I suppose you're right.|Just don't expect me to start wearing a white coat anytime soon.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Nothing like a bit of manual labor to keep the joints moving.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;You've been working tirelessly to help the villagers, {v:SkeletonName}.
speak;BoneBoy;What can I say?|I'm built for heavy lifting.|Literally.|No muscles to get tired.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Hey, someone's got to do the grunt work.|Might as well be the guy who doesn't need to worry about back pain.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;You make it sound so practical.
speak;BoneBoy;Everything's practical when you're a walking anatomy lesson.|But seriously, Princess, these people need all the help they can get.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Bridge repair duty.|Well, that's a first.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Were you helping with the construction, {v:SkeletonName}?
speak;BoneBoy;Turns out being waterproof has its advantages.|No rust, no rot, just good old-fashioned bone.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Princess, I don't have skin to wrinkle.|Though I do have to be careful not to lose any small pieces downstream.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;You'd be surprised how many problems you never think about until you're a skeleton.|But hey, the bridge is fixed, right?;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;So this is the ocean.|Can't say I remember seeing it before.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;It's...vast.|Makes you wonder what else is out there in the world.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Perhaps your past lies across these waters?
speak;BoneBoy;Maybe.|Or maybe I'm just a landlubber who never traveled.|Hard to tell when your memories are basically non-existent.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;The salt air seems to agree with you though.
speak;BoneBoy;Well, I don't have to worry about the salt corroding anything important.|Perks of being calcium-based, I suppose.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Night watch duty.|At least I don't need sleep.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;I guess that helps you stay vigilant, {v:SkeletonName}.
speak;BoneBoy;Someone has to keep an eye socket open.|Can't have monsters sneaking up on us.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;I have to give you my thanks for willing to protect us for so long.
speak;BoneBoy;Just doing my job, Princess.|Though I have to admit, the quiet gives me time to think.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Among other things.|Sometimes I wonder if I was a guard or soldier before.|This feels...natural.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;That place gave me the creeps.|And I'm literally a walking skeleton.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;You could sense the evil there too?
speak;BoneBoy;Something about it felt...wrong.|Like a memory I can't quite reach.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Perhaps you encountered such darkness before?
speak;BoneBoy;Maybe.|Or maybe being undead gives me a special sense for this stuff.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Either way, you fought bravely against them.
speak;BoneBoy;Well, evil doesn't usually respond to polite conversation.|Sometimes you just have to get your hands dirty.|Or bony, in my case.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Well, this is awkward.|Collecting bones when you ARE bones.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Nah, just makes me philosophical.|Could these have been someone like me once?;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Don't worry, Princess.|I'm not having an existential crisis.|Just wondering about the stories these bones could tell.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Your perspective is unique, that's certain.
speak;BoneBoy;Hey, someone's got to handle the bone-related tasks around here.|Might as well be the expert.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;You always find a way to make light of things.
speak;BoneBoy;Arrow dodging.|Now there's a skill I apparently have.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Your reflexes were incredible out there, {v:SkeletonName}.
speak;BoneBoy;Perks of not having vital organs to protect.|Makes you a bit more reckless.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;I'll take it.|Though I have to wonder if I was an archer in my past life.|Or maybe just someone who got shot at a lot.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Either way, we survived the tough battle.|Thank you for giving us a hand.
speak;BoneBoy;Just returning the favor, Princess.|You've given me a purpose when I had none.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Found something interesting in the rubble.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Yeah, when you don't have muscles to get tired, you can be pretty thorough.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Some old documents.|Can't read them all, but they might be important.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;We should have Seth look at them.
speak;BoneBoy;Good thinking.|Who knows?|Maybe they'll have clues about my past too.|A skeleton can dream, right?;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Strategy meetings.|The glamorous side of war.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Hey, someone's got to watch for eavesdroppers.|And I don't get bored easily.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Hard to get distracted when you don't have a stomach to growl or eyes to get tired.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Another advantage of your unique condition.
speak;BoneBoy;I'm starting to think being a skeleton isn't all downsides.|Though I still wouldn't recommend it as a lifestyle choice.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Yes.|It feels good to be back, even under these circumstances.
speak;BoneBoy;I can see why you'd fight so hard for it.|It's beautiful.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Do you think you had a homeland like this, {v:SkeletonName}?
speak;BoneBoy;Maybe.|Sometimes I wonder if there's a place where someone's still waiting for me to come home.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;I hope you find it someday.
speak;BoneBoy;Me too, Princess.|But until then, I'll help you protect yours.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;That wasn't Lyon out there.|Not the Lyon you knew.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;When you're undead yourself, you recognize the signs.|Whatever's controlling him...it's not natural.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;It's so hard to see him like this.
speak;BoneBoy;I'm sorry, Princess.|Losing someone to darkness...it's one of the worst kinds of loss.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;I...I'm not sure.|Maybe it's just intuition.|Or maybe it's a memory trying to surface.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Volcano warfare.|At least I don't sweat.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;The heat doesn't affect you I suppose, {v:SkeletonName}?
speak;BoneBoy;Nope.|No blood to boil, no skin to burn.|Just good old-fashioned bone.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;That's quite an advantage in this climate.
speak;BoneBoy;Every cloud has a silver lining, I suppose.|Even the cloud of being undead.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;You always find the positive side of things.
speak;BoneBoy;Well, when you're a walking skeleton, you have to find humor somewhere.|Otherwise you'd go mad.|Or madder.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Caught me in my downtime.|Well, this is embarrassing.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;I don't actually need sleep, but sometimes I like to just...think.|Or try to remember.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Fragments here and there.|Nothing concrete.|Just feelings, mostly.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;I suppose.|Though I was hoping for something more dramatic.|Like suddenly remembering I was a famous hero or something.;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;{v:SkeletonName}...|We're approaching the end of our journey.
speak;BoneBoy;The final battle.|I can feel it.|Whatever's ahead, it's big.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;As ready as a skeleton can be.|Though I have to admit, I'm nervous.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;What if I don't survive this?|What if I never learn who I was?;;;noir;;white
speak;Eirika;Then you'll be remembered for who you became.|A loyal friend and brave warrior.
speak;BoneBoy;Thanks, Princess.|That...that means more than you know.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;So you're the skeleton Eirika mentioned.|{v:SkeletonName}, right?
speak;BoneBoy;That's me.|Your friendly neighborhood undead warrior.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;I get that a lot.|Not many walking skeletons in your social circle, I'm guessing.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Can't say that I have.|But if you're fighting for Renais, you're welcome in my army.
speak;BoneBoy;Appreciate the warm welcome, Prince.|I'll try not to rattle too much during marches.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Keeping watch, Prince.|Someone's got to stay alert.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Good.|I like soldiers who take initiative.
speak;BoneBoy;Well, when you don't need sleep, night duty becomes pretty manageable.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;I aim to please.|Though I have to ask - does it bother you?|Having an undead in your ranks?;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;If you can fight and you're loyal, I don't care what you're made of.
speak;BoneBoy;Good to know.|I was worried you might want to exorcise me or something.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Sea travel.|Not as glamorous as the stories make it sound.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;The ocean doesn't agree with you?
speak;BoneBoy;Let's just say I discovered bones can rattle even when they're not scared.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Apparently being undead doesn't make you immune to everything.|Who knew?;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;At least you're honest about your weaknesses.
speak;BoneBoy;When you're held together by willpower and spite, honesty becomes a survival skill.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Awwww, we are on land already?;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Disappointed to be on land so soon?
speak;BoneBoy;I could have spent more days out there.|Maybe become a pirate?|Who know, maybe it was my destiny out there?;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;That's quite the impression the sea left on you.
speak;BoneBoy;Nah, I'm just messing with you.|Plus you guys are more fun.|I can always visit another time.|It's not like the sea is going anywhere anytime soon.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;That's one way to look at it.
speak;BoneBoy;It's rare to see you down like this, Prince.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;I just wonder if this fight could have been avoided?...
speak;BoneBoy;That Selena fellow seemed too stubborn, even for me.|I don't think we could convince her.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Hey, I'll tell you what.|If it makes you feel better, I'll tend to her grave every so often for you.|Hopefully that will give you peace of mind.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;...Are you sure?|That is a pretty big commitment.
speak;BoneBoy;I don't think I'll be going away anytime soon.|Will give me something to do over the years.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Such cramped passages.|Just the way I like it.|Nice and cool in here.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;No complaints about the cramped quarters?
speak;BoneBoy;Prince, when you're literally skin and bones,|well, just bones-|You learn to appreciate tight spaces.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;And the darkness doesn't affect your vision?
speak;BoneBoy;Empty eye sockets have their advantages.|Though I still don't understand how I can see anything.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;One of many.|But hey, mysterious undead vision beats stumbling around in the dark.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Reunion time.|Always interesting to see how these things play out.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;I will admit, it is nice to be back with my sister.|Have you been spying on us though?
speak;BoneBoy;Just observing.|Family dynamics are...complicated.|Even I can remember that much.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Not exactly.|More like an echo of what it felt like.|Warmth, I think.|Connection.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Perhaps those feelings will lead you back to your past.
speak;BoneBoy;Maybe.|Or maybe some feelings transcend memory.|Either way, I'm glad to see you and your sister together again.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;You can sense something wrong here too?
speak;BoneBoy;Like a chill in the air.|Though that might just be the undead in me talking.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Your instincts have been reliable so far.
speak;BoneBoy;Being dead apparently comes with a supernatural early warning system.|Who knew?;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;Stay alert.|We'll need every advantage we can get.
speak;BoneBoy;Don't worry, Prince.|Death has made me very good at staying aware of my surroundings.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;That Lyon...|something's very wrong with him.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;You could tell he wasn't himself?
speak;BoneBoy;The dead recognize corruption, Prince.|Whatever's controlling him reeks of dark magic.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;I...|I wish I knew.|Sometimes the darkness goes too deep to pull someone back.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;You sound like you're speaking from experience.
speak;BoneBoy;Maybe I am.|Memory or intuition, something tells me I've seen this kind of loss before.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Volcano warfare.|At least I don't sweat.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;The heat doesn't affect you I suppose, {v:SkeletonName}?
speak;BoneBoy;Nope.|No blood to boil, no skin to burn.|Just good old-fashioned bone.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;That's quite an advantage in this climate.
speak;BoneBoy;Every cloud has a silver lining, I suppose.|Even the cloud of being undead.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;You always find the positive side of things.
speak;BoneBoy;Well, when you're a walking skeleton, you have to find humor somewhere.|Otherwise you'd go mad.|Or madder.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Caught me in my downtime.|Well, this is embarrassing.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;I don't actually need sleep, but sometimes I like to just...think.|Or try to remember.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Fragments here and there.|Nothing concrete.|Just feelings, mostly.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;I suppose.|Though I was hoping for something more dramatic.|Like suddenly remembering I was a famous hero or something.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;{v:SkeletonName}.|We're about to face the source of all this darkness.
speak;BoneBoy;The Demon King himself.|I can feel his presence from here.;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Prince, I've been dead already.|What's the worst that could happen?;;;noir;;white
speak;BoneBoy;Then I'll make sure to take some demons with me.|Been a pleasure serving under you, Prince.;;;noir;;white
speak;Ephraim;The pleasure has been mine, {v:SkeletonName}.|You've proven that honor isn't limited to the living.
speak;BoneBoy;High praise from royalty.|Now let's go show this Demon King what Renais is made of.;;;noir;;white
